wikimedia-copyright: Châtlâh cha Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike License; ry liata a hmô ta, zi awpa laibâhpazy a saoh thei. Zizyhna lâchhâh hmâna he didiahpazy châta moh teih.
wikimedia-copyrightwarning:
A pathlainazy pachôna chô ta, [https://foundation.wikimedia.org/wiki/Special:MyLanguage/Policy:Terms_of_Use Terms of Use], he a pyh chih ta, [https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/ CC BY-SA 4.0 License] ry liata na paduapazy pathlei awpa ta a pyh chih ta, [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wikipedia:Text_of_the_GNU_Free_Documentation_License GFDL].
Hyperlink sâ kha acv URL cha the Creative Commons license ry liata a daihpakipa hihsâna a châ tahpa nâ pyh.
wikimedia-globalblocking-ipblocked:
'''{{int:wikimedia-globalblocking-blockedtext-all-wikis}}'''

$1 ($2) ta taopa block.
Piepa chhâna cha ''$3'' a châ.

* Block pathaona: $4
* Block chhâna: $5

Tahmâta nâna IP address cha $6 a châ.
